name: Kevin Yen (yen.118)
tagline: I'm in the process of reconstructing my site using Jenkyll. This is a temporary page (Jul 31, 2016)
body:
### Welcome to Kevin's personal site.
Hi! I'm Kevin Yen, a 1st-year Computer Science Engineering master student at Ohio State University.  

I'm working with Han-wei Shen on some interesting Visualization-related projects. That said, my interests doesn't only lie in Visualization. I've also done some work on Human-Computer Interaction, and am still exploring other fields for any possible integration with visualization, such as machine-learning and data-mining.

### Come around sometime later
Site should be ready before middle of August, please visit then for some showoffs!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
